title: Carolingian UI is reworked for v13!
content:
News for version 2.1.4:

  • Fade Out Control: Ability to enable or disable fade out behavior of interface elements individually.
  • Interface customization: Foundry v13 looks nicer, and not everyone wants to use all elements from Carolingian UI. Now, you can enable/disable each part of the interface individually. Don't want to change the macro layout or sidebar tabs? Go ahead and disable it!
  • Reworked Scene Navigation: Use the folder toggle on horizontal Scene Nav to navigate on your folders directly in scene nav Folder Navigation; Active / Viewed scenes are now separated as it's Foundry's default;
  • Shortcuts on Scene Preview: View and toggle global illumination, token vision and scene sound from preview
  • Toggle Floating chat box: Button to hide/show the chat input box
  • Players List avatars: show miniature images of each player in Players List

More on Discord or the Github repository.
